comments.comments_text: Gonzalo Higuain (Chelsea) announces himself with a close-range shot after a cross, but one of the defenders gets in the way of the ball to thwart him. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Chelsea will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Gonzalo Higuain (Chelsea) displayed his individual skill to score with a fantastic first-time shot from about 21 metres out. Jonas Lossl was helpless and couldn't reach the ball which ended up in the right side of the goal. Wonderful finish!
